sentence.Network_en: He is routinely described as the greatest scientist since Einstein.

sentence.Network_en: All adult dogs are routinely wormed at least every six months.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有的成年狗至少每半年要例行打一次虫。

sentence.Network_en: Any outside criticism is routinely dismissed as interference.
sentence.Network_cn: 任何来自外界的批评通常都被当作干涉而不予理睬。

entry.def: If something is routinely done, it is done as a normal part of a job or process.

example.ex: Vitamin K is routinely given in the first week of life to prevent bleeding.
example.tran: 出生后第一周通常要服用维生素K，以防止出血。

entry.def: If something happens routinely, it happens repeatedly and is not surprising, unnatural, or new.

example.ex: Any outside criticism is routinely dismissed as interference...
example.tran: 任何来自外界的批评通常都被当作干涉而不予理睬。

example.ex: He is routinely described as the greatest scientist since Einstein.
example.tran: 他通常被认为是继爱因斯坦之后最伟大的科学家。

means.word_mean: 1. according to routine or established practice;

sentences.sentence: "he routinely parked in a no-parking zone"

auth_sentence.content: Not that Clemente texts are routinely cheery or anodyne.
auth_sentence.res_content: Not that Clemente texts are routinely cheery or anodyne.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Not that Clemente texts are routinely cheery or anodyne.

auth_sentence.content: Do police officers routinely liaise with the PCC?
auth_sentence.res_content: Do police officers routinely liaise with the PCC?

auth_sentence.content: Water supplies are not routinely monitored for it.
auth_sentence.res_content: Water supplies are not routinely monitored for it.

Sentence.sentence: The Gatais used to frown when they received power bills that routinely topped $200.
So it makes sense that the elderly should be routinely screened for new tumors — or doesn't it?
Drivers routinely collide with deer and there are so many dead bodies left by the side of the road that the town has made it a deal with a local pet cemetery to collect and dispose of the bodies.
While 9 out of 10 white students routinely get their diplomas within six years, only 7 out of 10 black students made it to graduation day in several recent classes.

sentences.en: Children have been routinely immunized against polio since 1958.
sentences.cn: 自从1958 年以来，儿童都按照常规接种防治小儿麻痹症的疫苗。

sentences.en: The library routinely handles a wide variety of enquiries.
sentences.cn: 图书馆日常要处理各种各样的咨询。
